eg.projects

Interface Configurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProjectActions
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlActions, JavaActions, ProjectConfig, TxtActions

    public interface Configurable
    The interface to configure a project

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configFromSetWin(java.lang.String dir, java.lang.String suffix)
      Configures a project based on entries in the window of the SettingsWin object that is used to configure this project
      void findPreviousProjectRoot(java.lang.String dir)
      Tries to find the previously used project
      java.lang.String getProjectRoot()
      Returns this project's root directory
      SettingsWin getSetWin()
      Returns the SettingsWin object that is used to configure this project
      boolean isInProjectPath(java.lang.String dir)
      Determines if the specified directory includes the project's root directory
      void makeSetWinVisible(boolean enable)
      Makes the window of the SettingsWin object that is used to configure this project visible/invisible

    • Method Detail

      • getSetWin

        SettingsWin getSetWin()
        Returns the SettingsWin object that is used to configure this project
        Returns:
        the SettingsWin object

      • makeSetWinVisible

        void makeSetWinVisible(boolean enable)
        Makes the window of the SettingsWin object that is used to configure this project visible/invisible
        Parameters:
        enable - true to make the window for project settings visible, false to make it invisible

      • configFromSetWin

        void configFromSetWin(java.lang.String dir,
                      java.lang.String suffix)
        Configures a project based on entries in the window of the SettingsWin object that is used to configure this project
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory of the opened file
        suffix - the extension of the file

      • findPreviousProjectRoot

        void findPreviousProjectRoot(java.lang.String dir)
        Tries to find the previously used project
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that includes the directory of a previous project or not
